name: Monster Mania 3: The Fight for Heaven and Earth
name_original: Monster Mania 3: The Fight for Heaven and Earth
description:
Monster Truck Jousting!

Race past your opponent to reach your goal, but be prepared to fight to defend your side as well!

Pick up the sacrifice and deliver it to your enemy's gate. Need to "rescue" the poor chap from your enemy's clutches? Flip their truck to destroy it and gain control of the hostage. 

Controls:

Player 1 (hell truck):

  • Move left-right: A, D
  • Tilt truck down: S
  • Jump: W
  • Attack: Left Shift

Player 2 (heaven truck):

  • Move left-right: Left/right arrow keys
  • Tilt truck down: down arrow key
  • Jump: Up arrow key
  • Attack: Right shift
